name: Asian Chicken and Wild Rice Salad
author: megancs20
summary: A healthier take on lettuce wraps. These are delicious!
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) packages long grain and wild rice mix
1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
directions: Mix soy sauce and sesame oil in a bowl; rub mixture over chicken breasts
Heat a large skillet over medium heat; cook marinated chicken in the hot skillet until no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, about 20 minutes
Dice chicken when cool enough to handle and transfer to a large bowl
Combine water, long grain and wild rice mix, and butter in a saucepan; bring to a boil
Reduce heat, cover pan, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 25 minutes
Mix rice, mandarin oranges, water chestnuts, green onion, celery, and almonds with diced chicken; toss well
Chill mixture in refrigerator for at least 15 minutes
Line a large platter with lettuce leaves; top with chicken mixture
